alert.note: Alert for Grant; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 9:24AM CDT until July 30 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT/915 AM MDT/ FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SIOUX AND SOUTHEASTERN GRANT COUNTIES... At 923 AM CDT/823 AM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Watauga, or 29 miles northwest of Bullhead, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Sioux and southeastern Grant Counties, including the following locations... St. Gertrude, Standing Rock and Standing Rock Nation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
